readme: # `@typescript-eslint/parser` > An ESLint parser which leverages TypeScript ESTree to allow for ESLint to lint TypeScript source code. [![NPM Version](https://img.shields.io/npm/v/@typescript-eslint/parser.svg?style=flat-square)](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@typescript-eslint/parser) [![NPM Downloads](https://img.shields.io/npm/dm/@typescript-eslint/parser.svg?style=flat-square)](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@typescript-eslint/parser) ðŸ‘‰ See **https://typescript-eslint.io/packages/parser** for documentation on this package. > See https://typescript-eslint.io for general documentation on typescript-eslint, the tooling that allows you to run ESLint and Prettier on TypeScript code.
